articles.title: 'Wonky Flowers' to cut waste, support growers
articles.author: Jessica Marshall
articles.summary: Wonky Box launched Wonky Flowers in June, a new service designed to reduce waste in the New Zealand flower industry by offering a direct-to-consumer channel for surplus and cosmetically imperfect flowers. Wonky Flowers is available to Wonky Box subscribers for $52 plus delivery, providing up to 17 seasonal stems.

articles.title: Aldi's ‘magic' window cleaning gadget and ‘game-changing' vacuum to return to shelves in days
articles.author: Celine Marshall
articles.summary: ALDI is launching the Electric Window Vacuum for £19.99 and re-releasing the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum for £39.99. The Electric Window Vacuum features a spray function, cleaning pads, and a removable water tank, while the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum has powerful suction with eco and maximum levels, a washable dust container, and multiple attachments. These products will be available in stores starting August 17th as part of Aldi's Specialbuys.

articles.title: SSG.com launches Kim Dong-seon's Benson ice cream with special discounts
articles.author: Jeong Jae-Hwon
articles.summary: SSG.com is launching the premium ice cream brand "Benson" exclusively online, starting from the 15th. Benson, a brand by Hanwha Galleria's subsidiary Veruscoop Creamery, features rich flavors using 100% Korean raw milk. SSG.com is offering a 30% discount on all eight Benson products for one week to celebrate the launch.

articles.title: Researchers Say ChatGPT-5 Can Detect When It's Being Tested—and Change Its Behaviour
articles.author: Alfred Bui
articles.summary: OpenAI unveiled ChatGPT-5, the fifth generation of its AI chatbot, on August 7th. This new version features significant improvements in capabilities compared to previous models and demonstrates awareness of testing environments, altering its behavior accordingly.

articles.title: 37 Boring But Deeply Effective Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Hawaiian Tropic launched SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush which protects the hairline without hair getting goopy from sunscreen. Lumify Eye Drops launched new eye drops for instant reduction in redness in their eyes. Plackers launched "Grind No More" Night Guards which help reduce the tension from grinding teeth.

articles.title: Nintendo is putting an extremely rare GameCube game on Switch 2 next week
articles.author: engadget
articles.summary: Nintendo is adding the game Chibi-Robo!, originally published by Bandai, to the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack library on August 21. Chibi-Robo! is a 2005 platform-adventure game where a robot helps a family with housework.

articles.title: Labor Day Mattress Sales: These 28 Editor-Tested Beds Are On Sale Now
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Helix, Nectar, and DreamCloud have begun their Labor Day mattress sales early, offering deals on sleep editors' favorite beds.

articles.title: Meltwater rolls out GenAI Lens in Australia
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Meltwater has launched GenAI Lens in Australia, an enterprise-ready tool that allows companies to monitor and analyze their brand representation across generative AI platforms like ChatGPT and Gemini. GenAI Lens offers a view into digital conversations, helping brands detect misinformation, understand sentiment, and gain competitive insights, empowering them to move at the speed of culture.

articles.title: Even CEOs get a do-over now and then. Just ask OpenAI's Sam Altman.
articles.author: Peter Kafka
articles.summary: OpenAI initially planned to replace the older version of ChatGPT with a new one, but CEO Sam Altman quickly reversed this decision due to user feedback. The older version of ChatGPT will remain available in addition to the new version.

articles.title: Why I recommend the Google TV Streamer over competing Roku and Amazon Fire models
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Google launched the Google TV Streamer, a streaming device priced around $100. The streamer features enhanced image quality, fast performance, and smart home integrations within the Google ecosystem, featuring a revamped Google TV user experience which includes simplified navigation and easier app management.

articles.title: Kerrygold launches sweet butter sticks
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Ornua brand introduced a new product variety in the United States.

articles.title: The new Galaxy Buds Core arrive with noise cancellation Galaxy AI noise and integration
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Buds Core, a new wireless earbud featuring Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) and Galaxy AI integration for real-time audio translation. The earbuds boast a 6.5mm driver for enhanced bass, a triple-microphone system for clearer calls, and an ergonomic design. They offer up to 35 hours of battery life with the charging case (ANC off) and integrate seamlessly with the Galaxy ecosystem.

articles.title: Domino's Makes Waves With First-Ever Submarine Pizza Delivery On Loch Ness, Scotland
articles.author: Rolland Judd
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza introduced a new method of pizza delivery using a high-speed submarine at Loch Ness Lake. The submarine, powered by a 300-horsepower engine, can travel up to 45 miles per hour and even surge 16 feet out of the water, delivering fresh pizzas to customers. While Domino's has tested other innovative delivery methods, there are currently no plans to expand the submarine delivery service.

articles.title: 25 Target Items That Will Cut Down On Cleaning Time
articles.author: Lucia Peters
articles.summary: The article promotes a variety of cleaning products from different companies such as Shout stain remover wipes, Tide To-Go pen, Scrubbing Bubbles gel stamp, Lemi Shine garbage disposal cleaner pods, Dyson vacuum, Febreze fabric refresher, DampRid moisture absorbers, Mr. Clean Extra Durable Magic Erasers, Bissell carpet stain remover, Scrub Daddy PowerPaste, and Swiffer duster designed to simplify and expedite household cleaning tasks. These products range from stain removal to appliance maintenance, each aimed at providing quick and efficient solutions for busy individuals.

articles.title: Aldi joins hot air brush craze with rock-bottom £12.99 option – and similar gadgets cost over £100 more
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Aldi has launched several new products, including a £12.99 Hot Air Brush and Ionic Hairdryer, £3.99 Tanning Facial Drops, a £1.99 Lacura Prism fragrance, and £1.99 Touch Up Markers for home improvement. Aldi is also well-known for its affordable beauty dupes that often rival high-end brands in terms of quality and effectiveness, such as Lacura Healthy Glow Exfoliating Tonic and Lacura Q10 Renew Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream.

articles.title: Aldi joins hot air brush craze with rock-bottom £12.99 option – and similar gadgets cost over £100 more
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Aldi has launched several new products. These include a £12.99 hot air brush, a £12.99 Ionic Hairdryer, £3.99 Tanning Facial Drops, a £1.99 Lacura Prism fragrance, and £1.99 Touch Up Markers. These products are available in stores nationwide starting August 21st while stocks last.

articles.title: Is Amazon testing a cheaper color Kindle?
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Amazon's prototype, named Kindle Petit Color, features a color screen that allows users to adjust the intensity and saturation of individual colors. The user interface better utilizes the color E Ink screen, letting users change the colors of icons and the reading progress status bar. The text of an ebook can also be colored and will dynamically transition from one color to another through four different shades as you progress through a book.

articles.title: **Yahoo! JAPAN: Content Writing Services for EEA and UK Customers Only**
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Archyde.com provides content writing services tailored for Yahoo! JAPAN, including product descriptions, blog posts, website copy, and advertising copy. A UK-based skincare company experienced a 40% sales increase on Yahoo! Shopping after Archyde.com localized their product descriptions.

articles.title: ChatGPT users are still fuming about GPT-5's downgrades – here are the 4 biggest complaints
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 as the default model for ChatGPT, removing GPT-4o. Due to negative user feedback regarding GPT-5's performance compared to GPT-4o, OpenAI decided to bring back GPT-4o as a selectable option for Plus subscribers.

articles.title: NTT DATA and Google Cloud to accelerate Agentic AI adoption, cloud modernisation
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: NTT DATA is combining its expertise with Google Cloud's technologies. This collaboration aims to help businesses globally accelerate their AI-powered cloud adoption. The partnership unlocks new growth opportunities for businesses.

articles.title: How is your brand being portrayed on GenAI platforms like ChatGPT? Meltwater has a tool to track that
articles.author: Dan Barrett
articles.summary: Meltwater has launched GenAI Lens in Australia, a monitoring tool that provides organizations with visibility into how their brand, competitors, and industry are represented across generative AI platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini. The tool, available via Meltwater's Monitor feature, offers sentiment and trend analysis to help brands detect misinformation, refine communications strategies, and gain competitive insights.

articles.title: Lumen Surpasses 1,000 Customers on Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) Platform
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Lumen Technologies has exceeded 1,000 customers on its Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) platform. This milestone reflects the increasing demand for agile and scalable connectivity as businesses adopt AI.

articles.title: 21 Target Products To Help Parents Survive The Trenches
articles.author: Raylyn Paquin
articles.summary: The article showcases various new products and tools designed to assist with childcare, organization, and cleaning. Featured items include Infantino wrist rattles, Munchkin faucet extenders, Jool Baby travel potty seat, detangling spray, a formula-mixing pitcher, a cool mist humidifier, Ubbi grape cutter, snack organizers, Shark handheld vacuum, Skylight calendar, shoe organizer, Bissell vacuum/mop combo, electric toothbrush and a car seat buckle release tool.

articles.title: This Dyson dryer brush is $100 off on Amazon right now
articles.author: Ashley Morris
articles.summary: Dyson's Airwrap, a versatile hair styling tool functioning as a hair dryer, curling iron, blow dryer brush, and flat iron, is currently on sale. The Airwrap features three airflow speeds, three heat settings, a cold shot button, and various attachments for different styling needs, while being designed to prevent heat damage.

articles.title: Touch ‘n Go, Proton Ink MoU To Equip New X50 With TnG RFID Tags
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Touch 'n Go (TNG) and Proton Holdings have partnered to equip all new Proton X50 units with Touch 'n Go Radio-Frequency Identification (RFID) tags at the production stage. The latest Proton X50, launched on July 24, features redesigned exterior and interior, updated connectivity technology and a 1.5-litre i-GT turbocharged engine.

articles.title: Yes, That Was a Giant SPAM Sushi Driving Down La Brea
articles.author: Chris Nichols
articles.summary: Hormel launched their new line of SPAM® sushi at Ralphs by creating a 7-foot-tall SPAM® Musubi Mobile. The vehicle was used to distribute samples of SPAM® Musubi, SPAM® Norimaki and SPAM® swag in Los Angeles.

articles.title: This Canadian brand has streamlined skincare down to a science
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Ädesē, a Canadian skincare brand, launched a two-step skincare system utilizing a proprietary Walled Garden technology. The core two-step system is priced between $62 and $128, and refills range between $59 and $122. The brand can be found online at adeseskin.com and on social media.

articles.title: This Canadian brand has streamlined skincare down to a science
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Ädesē, a Canadian skincare brand, has launched a two-step skincare system featuring its proprietary Walled Garden technology. The products, designed for simplicity and broad suitability, are formulated and made in Toronto, aiming to provide intelligent and effortless skincare solutions.

articles.title: Freshers' guide: essential items for university halls
articles.author: Abha Shah
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Crispi air fryer, a compact and versatile appliance designed for cooking on the move or in small kitchens. It offers functions such as roasting, air frying, keeping warm, and recrisping. Despite requiring a plug point for operation, it provides excellent cooking performance for quick and crispy meals.

articles.title: Warp Launches SMB Suite to Eliminate Logistics Complexity for Growing Brands
articles.author: Warp
articles.summary: Warp launched the Warp SMB Suite on August 13, 2025, which provides a bundled logistics solution for small and medium-sized businesses in the apparel, retail, and consumer goods sectors. The SMB Suite integrates Warp's nationwide network and technology into one seamless experience.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Trio Of New Gaming Monitors—Including World's First 500Hz OLED
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: A new 27-inch 500Hz model and two new big-screen curved 4K LCD options have been introduced. These new models expand the product offerings.

articles.title: These 7 robot vacuums clean your home so you can get some much needed R&R
articles.author: Harry Rabinowitz
articles.summary: The article discusses the introduction and features of various robot vacuums from companies including Eufy, Roborock, iRobot, Shark, and Bissell. Notably, the Eufy X10 Pro Omni offers advanced navigation and a base station for self-emptying and water management, while the Eufy Omni E28, launched in April, features a built-in deep cleaner. Roborock models, like the Q10 X5+, offer self-emptying base stations and intelligent mapping, and the Shark IQ XL features a self-emptying base for convenience.

articles.title: There is no…: ChatGPT head on what you need to be successful at OpenAI
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI launched and updated ChatGPT, experimenting with features like the model chooser and the real-time router based on user feedback.  OpenAI prioritizes rapid deployment and learning from real users to iterate on its AI models, even if it means shipping products before they're fully polished. This approach allows OpenAI to adapt to the unpredictable nature of AI development.

articles.title: Unveiling the Future: Cutting-Edge Innovations in Technology Redefining Our World
articles.summary: Bitmate has launched Ume Beauty, a new platform designed to revolutionize user interaction with digital aesthetics. This platform incorporates advanced algorithms and AI to personalize user experience, offering tools for creating and sharing digital content. The launch marks Bitmate's commitment to innovation and expansion in the digital landscape.

articles.title: 7 best bread makers for delicious homemade loaves, from sourdough to gluten-free
articles.author: Alicia Miller
articles.summary: Several bread makers are highlighted, including the Panasonic mini bread maker, Russell Hobbs classics breadmaker, Gastroback design automatic bread maker advanced, Panasonic bread maker SD-R2530KXC, and Tower gluten free digital bread maker. These machines offer various features such as multiple settings, timers, and specialized functions like sourdough and gluten-free baking, catering to different consumer needs and preferences in homemade bread making.

articles.title: Aditya Birla Group's TMRW to raise Rs 437 crore from ServiceNow Ventures
articles.summary: A company will leverage ServiceNow AI platform. This will enhance the company's speed-to-market. It will also focus assortments and consumer experiences across its omni-channel footprint.

articles.title: ChatGPT 5 Rival Claude AI Chatbot Gets New Memory Feature: How It Helps
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Anthropic is launching a new memory feature for its Claude AI chatbot, initially available to Max, Team, and Enterprise premium users. Grok AI chatbot is making its Imagine AI feature, which generates videos and photos from text or voice prompts, free for all users and accessible on Android devices.

articles.title: NVIDIA and Black Forest Labs Launch FLUX.1 Kontext NIM Microservice for Enhanced Image Editing
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched FLUX.1 Kontext, a new image-editing model for RTX AI PCs, as an Nvidia NIM microservice. The model is powered by Nvidia RTX and TensorRT and is available to RTX AI PC users.

articles.title: Meet Uttar Pradesh's richest man, who earned thousands of crores by selling detergent, his name is…, net worth is Rs….
articles.summary: RSPL Group, owned by Muralidhar Gyanchandani, produces Ghadi detergent and has expanded its product line to include soap, footwear (Red Chief brand), and dairy products. The company has evolved from a small venture into a major player in India's FMCG market.

articles.title: Cross-Platform Developers Get Full Control Over Game Distribution With New Features for Xsolla Publishing Suite
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xsolla has announced a major expansion to its Publishing Suite, a modular solution for PC, web, and cross-platform games. The updates enhance the value for free-to-play and buy-to-play games by enabling faster monetization, streamlined operations, and advanced LiveOps capabilities. New features include an Instant F2P Store Template, Multi-Page Site Creation tools, Cloud Gaming Integration, and Instant Play with Progressive Download.

articles.title: 7 best bread makers for delicious homemade loaves, from sourdough to gluten-free
articles.author: Alicia Miller
articles.summary: Alicia Miller tested bread makers, including the Panasonic mini bread maker, for IndyBest reviews, focusing on bread quality, ease of cleaning, noise levels, and value for money. The review presents the best bread machines for 2025.

articles.title: Crowdfunding key to Taiwan's tech expansion in Japan  Aug. 13, 2025 15:56
articles.summary: Taiwanese tech companies are utilizing crowdfunding platforms like Green Funding to introduce and validate new products in the Japanese market. Maktar launched its Qubii Power through Green Funding, raising over ¥36 million. Similarly, Asus debuted its new AR smart glasses on the platform to test market reception before a broader retail launch.

articles.title: Taco Bell is adding second Mountain Dew Baja Blast flavor to its menu
articles.summary: Taco Bell will introduce a new, thirst-quenching item on its menu.

articles.title: Why Your Oral Care Routine Could Be Missing This Crucial Step?
articles.author: Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Colgate has expanded its product line to include offerings like Colgate Purple, MaxFresh, Barbie electric toothbrush and Colgate Active Salt to cater to diverse consumer preferences. These products are designed to appeal to different demographics, from children to Gen Z and Millennials, addressing specific needs such as whitening, flavor, and oral health benefits, while the Colgate Total is reliable options.

articles.title: LinkedIn Will Now Enable Brands to Sponsor User Posts that Link to a LinkedIn Event
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: LinkedIn introduced 'Thought Leader Event Ads', a new feature enabling businesses to sponsor member posts that include links to LinkedIn events. This aims to enhance event promotion by leveraging user-generated content and influencer marketing. These ads can only be used with brand awareness or engagement objectives.

articles.title: Infobip Positions AI as the New Standard for Customer Experience in Asia-Pacific  Aug. 13, 2025 15:00
articles.summary: Infobip launched its new report, 'The AI Advantage: How Leading Brands Thrive in a 24 x 7 Customer World,' providing insights into the role of AI technologies in customer engagement across Asia-Pacific. The report highlights how brands can use AI to deliver connected, real-time experiences and meet the expectations of hyper-digital consumers.

articles.title: How to get a free 15-day trial of Walmart Plus, Walmart's Amazon Prime-like membership
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Walmart launched Walmart+, a new subscription shopping service, on September 15 for $98 a year or $13 per month. New subscribers can try a free 15-day trial that includes free shipping, gas discounts at Walmart and Murphy gas stations, and a Scan & Go feature for in-store shopping. Walmart+ offers unlimited "fast as same-day" free delivery on over 160,000 products.

articles.title: Ninja Swirl by Creami review: I made delicious soft serve in minutes with this viral ice cream maker
articles.author: Millie West
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by Creami, an upgraded version of its previous Ninja Creami. The new product features 13 programs to create various frozen desserts and a soft-serve swirl arm to make Mr Whippy-style ice cream. This versatile machine delivers consistent results, producing smooth and creamy ice cream without ice crystals.

articles.title: Whisky Barrel Aged KitKat' Smoky Release Arrives In Time For The Holidays
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nestle is introducing a new KitKat flavor. This new flavor is result of experimentation.

articles.title: New to The Street Signs VERB Technology Company to a 1-Year Media Campaign
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: VERB Technology Company is launching a 12-month media campaign to amplify its new Toncoin digital asset strategy across national TV, digital, and out-of-home media.

articles.title: 7 Best Diapers for Babies with Sensitive Skin
articles.summary: Pampers Swaddlers diapers are lightweight and absorbent with wetness indicators. Pampers Pure Protection diapers are fragrance-free with shea butter for sensitive skin. Huggies Snug & Dry diapers have a four-layer core for 12-hour protection.

articles.title: I Tried £238 Worth Of Face Mists & This Is The Best One For Hot Weather
articles.author: Venus Wong
articles.summary: Rhode launched Glazing Mist, featuring ectoin, ceramides, and vitamin B5. Chanel introduced No. 1 de Chanel Serum-in-Mist, with red camellia extract. Laneige offers Cream Skin Cerapeptide Mist, containing peptides and ceramides, which is the mist version of their Cream Skin Cerapeptide Toner.

articles.title: Amazon expands its perishable delivery service, putting pressure on traditional grocers
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Amazon is rolling out a new service for Prime members. This service allows them to order groceries, such as blueberries and milk, along with other items like batteries.

articles.title: PixNova AI Launches Revolutionary Video and Photo Face Swap Technology, Redefining Creative Media Standards
articles.summary: PixNova AI has launched its next-generation Video Face Swap and Photo Face Swap technology. This upgrade enhances accuracy and realism while improving processing speed, targeting creators, film studios, and social media influencers. The new AI face swap feature allows users to generate high-quality images and videos with simple steps.

articles.title: Hidden Door is an AI storytelling game that actually makes sense
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Hidden Door, a new interactive platform, is launched that allows users to co-write stories with AI in settings like Wizard of Oz, Pride and Prejudice, and The Crow. Unlike general-purpose chatbots, Hidden Door limits user actions within the story's universe, thus offering a more structured narrative experience. The platform includes features like character cards and plot point decks.

articles.title: Wyze Duo Cam Pan: Innovative Dual-Camera Setup Eliminates Blind Spots with Advanced Motion Tracking and Coverage Expansion
articles.summary: Wyze has launched the Duo Cam Pan, a new home security camera featuring a dual-camera system for comprehensive surveillance. The Duo Cam Pan is available now for $69.98 individually or $129.98 for a two-pack. It features 2K resolution, color night vision, IP65 weather resistance, motion-triggered spotlights, two-way audio, and local storage support, and is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold revealed in first official video teaser – here are 5 things to expect
articles.author: James Rogerson
articles.summary: Google is teasing the upcoming Pixel 10 Pro Fold, which is expected to have several upgrades. These include improved dust resistance, a larger 5,050mAh battery, new AI features like 'Camera Coach' and 'Conversational Photo Editing', a Tensor G5 chipset, and a brighter 6.4-inch cover screen with 3,000 nits peak brightness.

articles.title: ServicePower Previews the Future of Field Service with AI On-Demand Home Services Cloud
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ServicePower unveiled its On-Demand Home Services Cloud, an AI-assisted platform designed to transform brand service delivery. The platform connects brands with 222,000 vetted contractors and provides intelligent, automated, and compliant service at scale.

articles.title: Fire TV Stick rival takes the fight to Amazon with very cheap new streaming service
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Roku has launched a new ad-free video subscription service called Howdy, available in the US, Canada, and Mexico for $2.99 per month. Howdy boasts nearly 10,000 hours of shows and films and is accessible via Roku-branded hardware.

articles.title: Samsung or LG? Pick the Best Washing Machine this Independence Day
articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.summary: Bajaj Mall is offering Independence Day deals on Samsung and LG washing machines, with financing options available through Bajaj Finserv. Specific models from both brands are highlighted, along with their prices and EMI options. The promotion encourages consumers to upgrade to a smart washing machine and take advantage of these offers.

articles.title: 32 Beauty Products Reviewers Over 50 Approve Of
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Glossier introduces Ultralip, a hydrating lipstick containing hyaluronic acid. Schick launches Silk dermaplaning razor for facial hair removal. Boldify releases a root touch-up powder to cover grays and thinning hair.

articles.title: Xsolla Unveils LiveOps Management Suite to Boost D2C Monetization for Game Developers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xsolla announces the upcoming launch of the Xsolla LiveOps Management Suite, a new tool designed for teams to build and operate direct-to-consumer LiveOps. The tool enhances the efficiency of managing and defining campaigns and offers within existing Web Shops.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works opens kiosks in 600 college bookstores. Find out where in Kentucky
articles.author: USA TODAY NETWORK
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works will sell its products at over 600 college campus stores in the 2025-26 academic year, including several in Kentucky. They are partnering with ICM Distributing Company to launch kiosks in bookstores like Barnes & Noble College and Follett, offering body creams, fragrance mists, hand sanitizers, and candles, featuring popular scents like Champagne Toast.

articles.title: The secret to perfect summer drinks is this countertop appliance that has a cult following
articles.author: Rachel Morrison
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Simzlife countertop nugget ice maker on sale for $154.98, which is 43% off its original price. The ice maker produces up to 35 pounds of nugget ice in 24 hours and features a self-cleaning function and smart alerts.

articles.title: How AI Is Redefining New Product Development In Fashion
articles.author: Sandeep Kumar
articles.summary: AI is transforming new product development (NPD) in the fashion industry. AI tools are being used for trend insight, design iteration, BOM automation, virtual prototyping, and launch optimization, helping fashion brands to accelerate design finalization.  For example, VibeIQ helps teams accelerate design finalization.

articles.title: Games Inbox: Is an Xbox Game Pass subscription worth it?
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: Microsoft's Xbox Series X and Series S consoles impact game development, creating challenges for developers to optimize games across both platforms. The upcoming Switch 2 also presents a consideration for developers when making next-generation games. The article indirectly discusses future updates to Xbox and potential new releases/optimizations for Switch 2.

articles.title: 3 useful Walmart Plus membership benefits that make it a strong Amazon Prime competitor, including free shipping on all orders
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Walmart launched Walmart+, a new shopping membership service, in September offering benefits like unlimited free delivery, Scan & Go for touch-free checkout, and fuel discounts. Walmart+ members can also enjoy no minimum shipping for orders, and Sam's Club fuel stations were added to the fuel discount program.

articles.title: LIO Launches Next-Generation Inpatient Mental Health Platform with Advanced Rounding,
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: LIO announced the launch of its new [unspecified product or service] on August 13, 2025, in Wilmington, Delaware.

articles.title: Treasure Data Introduces "No Compute" Pricing, Delivering Predictable Economics with Hybrid CDP Architecture
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Treasure Data has launched a 'No Compute' pricing model for its Intelligent Customer Data Platform (CDP). The new model decouples cost from processing resources, charging primarily for unified customer profiles and associated behavioral events. This allows brands to run unlimited queries, segmentations, and activations without fear of runaway bills.

articles.title: D'YAVOL Spirits: A New Era in India's Premium Alcobev Industry
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Radico Khaitan Limited has partnered with D'YAVOL Luxury Collective, Shah Rukh Khan, and Nikhil Kamath to launch D'YAVOL Spirits. This new venture will debut with a premium tequila, aiming to redefine the Indian premium alcobev landscape with globally sourced products.

articles.title: Search.com launches AI chat that pays users and publishers
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: Public Good has launched Search.com, a new generative AI search platform, offering free access and cashback rewards to users. The platform provides revenue streams for publishers and a brand-safe advertising environment for brands. Search.com is now available on desktop and mobile for iOS and Android.

articles.title: 24 Useful Products That You'll Be Tempted To Gatekeep
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Laneige introduced the Neo Blurring Powder, designed to smoothen skin and reduce shine while maintaining a natural glow. Nyx launched the Pore Filler Targeted Stick, a sensitive skin-friendly product that reduces pore appearance and smooths skin without adding shine. Maybelline released a volumizing brow mousse, which reviewers claim is superior to Anastasia and Benefit brow products, designed to fill, fluff, and tame brows for a natural, full look.

articles.title: The Future Of Work: A CEO's Playbook For GenAI Transformation
articles.author: Vishal Talwar
articles.summary: Shutterstock launched its own AI image generator, transforming from a marketplace to an integrated creation platform. This launch aims to capture the entire value chain and democratize creation for subscribers, presenting both opportunities and challenges for human contributors.

articles.title: Beijing Welcomes First-Ever Retail Shop Fully Operated By Robots; 'Thousands Of People To Become Homeless,' Netizens React
articles.author: Rutunjay Dole
articles.summary: A retail shop in Beijing has launched a fully robot-operated cabin. The robot serves coffee and bottled drinks and can interact with customers in different languages. Galaxi Bot, the robotics company, aims to offer a diverse product selection at these cabins, with plans for expansion in metro cities and tourist places.

articles.title: 6 products Ghanaian entrepreneurs can sell on the Asian market
articles.summary: Ghanaian entrepreneurs are poised to introduce products such as shea butter, African black soap (Alata Samina), cashew nuts, rubber, chocolates, and real estate to the Asian market. This expansion aims to capitalize on the growing interest in African products within Asia, with Singaporean companies having already invested significantly in the continent.

articles.title: Just 27 Cheaper Versions Of Pricey Products For You
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: Several companies offer affordable alternatives to high-end products. Essence promotes Lash Princess Mascara as a budget-friendly option to expensive mascaras and Elizavecca offers a Hair Treatment comparable to Olaplex. Peripera features Ink Velvet Lip Tint to rival Charlotte Tilbury's lipstick, while LilyAna Naturals provides Eye Cream similar to Shiseido and Clinique at a lower price.

articles.title: Laprade and Phillips: Instant Pot was a triumph cooked up in Ottawa
articles.author: Sam Laprade
articles.summary: Robert Wang created the Instant Pot, a multi-functional cooking appliance, to solve the problem of busy parents preparing meals. After investing $300,000, Wang launched the Instant Pot on Amazon in 2010. The product reached a high point in 2015 selling 215,000 units on Amazon Prime Day.

articles.title: Small places in China cultivate big industries
articles.summary: Shandong DHZ Fitness Equipment Co Ltd, in collaboration with DeepSeek, introduced intelligent fitness equipment featuring real-time exercise angle adjustments and personalized workout plans. This new equipment is part of a digital fitness trend in Ningjin county, which has a comprehensive fitness equipment supply chain.

articles.title: 49 Everyday Products That'll Give You That 'Accomplished My Checklist' High
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of several new cleaning and home organization products.  Bissell launches a Little Green upholstery cleaner for stain removal, while Instant Pot introduces a versatile appliance with multiple cooking functions. Tineco offers a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop for simultaneous floor cleaning.

articles.title: 33 Organization Products For A Neat Home
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article showcases several innovative products designed for home cleaning and organization, including the Dawn Platinum Powerwash dish spray for effortless dish cleaning, the Sunny & Honey Carpet Miracle cleaner for stain removal, and the Wet & Forget cleaner for maintaining a clean shower. Additionally, it features products like the ChomChom hair roller for pet hair removal and the Rocco & Roxie's multisurface stain and odor-eliminating spray for pet-related accidents.

articles.title: Home Bargains reduces £47 beauty set 'perfect for dry skin' to £6
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains has launched special offers on beauty products. The Dr. Lipp Wash & Glow set is now £5.99 (originally £47), the Jil Sander Simply Shower Gel is £2.99 (originally £20), and the Moroccanoil Color Complete Shampoo and Conditioner are both £1.49 (originally £10).

articles.title: GPT-5: has AI just plateaued?
articles.author: The Conversation
articles.summary: OpenAI claims its new flagship model, GPT-5, marks a significant step toward artificial general intelligence (AGI).

articles.title: Aldi is selling a dupe of popular noughties alcoholic drink – and it ‘tastes just like Ribena'
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: ALDI has launched Tangz Blackcurrant Sour Liqueur, a new alcoholic beverage priced at £6.99. This tipple, available across the UK from August 21, is designed to taste like Ribena, offering a nostalgic blackcurrant flavor with an adult twist.

articles.title: Aldi is selling a dupe of popular noughties alcoholic drink – and it ‘tastes just like Ribena'
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: ALDI has launched Tangz Blackcurrant Sour Liqueur, a new alcoholic drink priced at £6.99, which is available across the UK starting August 21. The liqueur, which tastes like Ribena, joins ALDI's existing Tangz range, including Sour Apple and Sour Cherry.

articles.title: Adani Digital Labs bets on loyalty programme, lounge booking & revamped app to lock in airport passengers
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Adani Digital Labs launched a suite of digital services, including a new loyalty program named Adani Rewards.

articles.title: Tourists mistake pizza delivery in Loch Ness for 'weird beast'
articles.author: George Jones
articles.summary: Domino's has launched a new pizza delivery service using a shark-like submarine that can reach speeds of up to 45 miles per hour. This is the latest in a series of unconventional delivery methods by the company, including a robot dog, pothole-proof bike, Pepperoni Passion perfume and Garlic & Herb Egg, aiming to innovate and surprise customers.

articles.title: Poco M7 Plus 5G launched with 7,000mAh battery and 144Hz display, price starts at Rs 13,999
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Poco launched the M Plus G smartphone. The new phone features a mAh battery and Hz display. The starting price is Rs.

articles.title: How to use Android's 'Messages for web' feature to send and receive texts from a web browser on any device
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google launched "Messages for web", a new service that synchronizes with the SMS Messages app on Android phones, allowing users to send and receive text messages in any browser. The service can be set up by visiting messages.google.com/web in a browser and scanning a QR code from the Messages app on the phone.

articles.title: Walplast Launches Nova 125: Redefining Premium Gypsum Standards in India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Walplast Products Pvt. Ltd. has launched Nova 125, a premium gypsum product, in Mumbai. Nova 125 offers unmatched coverage of 125 sq. m. per tonne and a superior surface finish with benefits like excellent bonding, crack resistance, and thermal and acoustic insulation.

articles.title: This is what Atlanta smells like
articles.author: Nedra Rhone
articles.summary: Fulton & Roark, an American fine fragrance company, has introduced a new scent inspired by the city of Atlanta. The new fragrance aims to encapsulate the complex spirit of Atlanta, capturing its grit, glam, and history, and it is inspired by Woodruff Park. The company was co-founded by Atlanta native Kevin Keller.

articles.title: Pioneering Freeze-Dried Technology in Vietnam: Nature Foods Company Introduces Convenient and Healthy Eating Solutions
articles.summary: Nature Foods Company (NFC) utilizes freeze-dried technology to produce convenient, nutritious, and safe ready-to-eat foods in Vietnam. Their products cater to the demand for quick meal solutions without compromising quality and are suitable for various occasions like office breakfasts or outdoor trips. NFC is expanding its range of convenient, nutritious, and safe products to elevate Vietnam's food industry.

articles.title: Photo Collection: Full Dress Rehearsal For 79th Independence Day
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Poco has launched the M7 Plus 5G in India. The new phone features a 7,000mAh battery and a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset.

articles.title: In Pictures: Indian Army On High Alert Along LoC Ahead Of Independence Day
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Poco launched the M7 Plus 5G in India. The new phone features a 7,000mAh battery and a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset. Price and specifications were also announced.

articles.title: Xsolla's Leading Web Shop Puts Mobile Developers Back in Control to Shift Revenue, Own Their Data, and Build Direct-to-Player Experiences That Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xsolla announces significant updates to its Web Shop solution for mobile games, designed to help developers earn more substantial and long-term revenue through direct-to-consumer monetization. These updates enable studios to retain a larger share of their income.

articles.title: Purcotton Brings 100% Pure Cotton Comfort And Sustainability To Malaysia
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Purcotton, a premium cotton lifestyle brand, has launched in Malaysia with its range of 100% cotton essentials. The launch includes a pop-up experience at 1 Utama Shopping Centre and availability in retail stores like Jaya Grocer and online platforms like Shopee and Lazada. The brand offers products such as cotton tissues, wet wipes, feminine hygiene products, baby care, and home care essentials.

articles.title: 永太科技：氟化液液冷产品客户验证工作正在进行_手机网易网
articles.author: 财联社
articles.summary: Yongtai Technology is conducting customer verification for its fluorinated liquid cooling product. This indicates the company is introducing or preparing to launch this new product.

articles.title: Infobip Positions AI as the New Standard for Customer Experience in Asia-Pacific
articles.summary: Infobip launched a report, "The AI Advantage: How Leading Brands Thrive in a 24 x 7 Customer World," highlighting the importance of AI in customer engagement across Asia-Pacific. The report underscores the role of Infobip's Conversational Experience Orchestration Platform (CXOP), powered by agentic AI, in delivering personalized and real-time experiences. The launch emphasizes how brands can leverage AI to improve customer service and build lasting relationships.

articles.title: Google reveals Pixel 10 Pro Fold ahead of launch
articles.summary: Google has teased its upcoming Pixel 10 Pro Fold, showcasing its design through a short video. The new foldable device will have a sleek design similar to its predecessor, potentially featuring an IP68 rating and being available in gray, with possible green and gold color options. Its release is rumored for October.

articles.title: Chennai-based Dhobi G secures ₹1.5-crore funding from Indian Overseas Bank
articles.author: Sangeetha Kandavel
org: Centre for Innovation in Laundry and Dry Cleaning
articles.summary: Dhobi G is expanding its laundry services by developing facilities in five more campuses, targeting over 7,500 students. This expansion includes venturing into northern India and targeting the Bengaluru and Coimbatore markets. Dhobi G focuses on technology-driven, accountability-driven laundry services and has developed CILDC for training and LaundryOS to manage operations. Also Dhobi G is promoting their water-efficient machines that save the equivalent of 570 municipal water tankers every year.

articles.title: One Big, Fat, Wadded-Up Mess and How to Fix It
articles.summary: Cyndi Bray created and launched "Wad-Free", a plastic gadget designed to prevent sheets from tangling in washing machines and dryers. This product allows sheets to move more freely, resulting in faster drying times, fewer wrinkles, and balanced washer loads. Wad-Free is available for purchase online at WadFree.com.

articles.title: One Big, Fat, Wadded-Up Mess and How to Fix It
articles.author: Creators
articles.summary: Cyndi Bray launched Wad-Free in June 2020, a product designed to prevent sheets from wadding up in washers and dryers. Wad-Free consists of two-pack square plastic pieces with locking clips that attach to each corner of the sheet. The product keeps loads balanced, allows sheets to move freely, and results in faster drying times and fewer wrinkles.

articles.title: One Big, Fat, Wadded-Up Mess and How to Fix It
articles.author: Creators
articles.summary: Wad-Free, a square plastic gadget with locking clips, prevents sheets from tangling in the washer and dryer. Launched in June 2020 by Cyndi Bray, Wad-Free is available online at WadFree.com and allows sheets to move more freely, resulting in faster cleaning and drying with fewer wrinkles.

articles.title: One Big, Fat, Wadded-Up Mess and How to Fix It, by Mary Hunt
articles.summary: Cyndi Bray launched Wad-Free in June 2020, a plastic gadget designed to prevent sheets from tangling in washing machines and dryers. This product, available at WadFree.com, uses locking clips to keep sheets from wadding up, resulting in balanced loads, faster drying times, and fewer wrinkles.

articles.title: Litmus7's AI Leap: Transforming Tomorrow's Tech Landscape
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Litmus7 has launched its AI Innovation Office in Trivandrum, India, to create generative models and AI-centric products under the initiative called Neural Intelligence. This initiative aims to enable intuitive AI-human interaction. The new office will serve as a collaborative hub featuring labs and studios to advance AI research and applications.

articles.title: Sennheiser Accentum Open review: These earphones punch above their weight in sound and design
articles.summary: Sennheiser launched the Accentum Open wireless earphones, featuring an open-ear design, 11mm dynamic transducers for rich sound, and up to 28 hours of battery life. These earphones offer a simple pairing process with Bluetooth 5.3 and are priced at Rs 9,990.

articles.title: The ultimate beauty statement: Here's how to get the most out of your fragrance
articles.author: Janine Donovan
articles.summary: DB Designer Brands introduces Aphrodite EDP, inspired by Burberry Goddess EDP. Aerre launches After Hours EDP as an alternative to YSL's Black Opium. Zara offers Apple Juice EDT, likened to Chanel Chance Eau Tendre EDT. Also, Lancome released La Vie Est Belle Gift Set Eau De Parfum and Body Lotion and Mecca Max released Optimist Fragrance Mist Holiday Heatwave.

articles.title: How to foster innovation at work
articles.author: Scott D. Anthony
articles.summary: DBS Bank transformed its business strategy by investing in technology and fostering a culture of innovation. Procter & Gamble launched Pampers disposable diapers, which became a very successful product.

articles.title: Asics Expands Blast Running Shoes With New Foam And Two New Styles
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: MegaBlast and SonicBlast are new products that feature the brand's new proprietary FF Turbo Squared foam. This foam provides a 'bouncy' ride.

articles.title: Vivo V60 review: Reliable all-rounder with big battery and fresh design
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: The Vivo V is being reviewed as a reliable all-rounder, notable for its large battery and a fresh design. This suggests a new or updated product offering from Vivo.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl soft serve ice cream maker is almost $50 off right now
articles.author: NBC News
articles.summary: Ninja Swirl, a soft serve and ice cream maker, launched in the spring. Best Buy is offering it at a discounted price.

articles.title: Shah Rukh Khan's Son Aryan Khan, Radico Khaitan's Abhishek Khaitan and Entrepreneur Nikhil Kamath Join Hands To Launch D'YAVOL Spirits (See Pic)
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: D'YAVOL, Radico Khaitan, and Nikhil Kamath have collaborated to launch D'YAVOL Spirits, a new luxury spirits venture. The initial product will be a premium tequila, marking D'YAVOL's expansion into the alcohol beverage industry.

articles.title: Shah Rukh Khan's Son Aryan Khan, Radico Khaitan's Abhishek Khaitan and Zerodha's Nikhil Kamath Join Hands To Launch D'YAVOL Spirits (See Pic)
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: D'YAVOL, Radico Khaitan, and Nikhil Kamath have collaborated to launch D'YAVOL Spirits, debuting with a premium tequila. Aryan Khan announced the partnership via Instagram, showcasing a picture featuring himself, SRK, Abhishek Khaitan, and Nikhil Kamath.

articles.title: 20 Budget-Friendly Target Beauty Must-Haves
articles.author: Steph Weaver
articles.summary: Nyx offers a moisturizing lip pencil for \$4.99 and E.l.f. provides blush for \$3, alongside color-correcting primer for \$5.49. Maybelline's Baby Lips lip balm is available for \$4.89, while Dove offers a travel-sized Men+Care body and face wash for \$2.19. Pond's features a dry skin cream moisturizer for \$5.99 and Vaseline provides a two-pack of rosy-hued lip therapy balm for \$2.59.

articles.title: Slash your laundry bills by switching 1 thing when cleaning clothes
articles.author: Aditi Rane
articles.summary: Grant Store suggests using pre-measured detergent pods to avoid using excessive detergent in laundry, which leads to unnecessary rinse cycles and increased water and energy consumption. Detergent pods ensure the correct amount is used per load, offering convenience and accuracy for consumers.

articles.title: I tried Wendy's for first time and I know where I'll be going for next fast food fix
articles.author: Conaill Corner
articles.summary: Wendy's opened a new branch in Bromborough and customers tried the Wendy's Single, which is a classic cheeseburger. The fries were described as excellent. Also customers tried a vanilla Frosty.

articles.title: ASUS Unveils NUC 15 Performance
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: ASUS has announced the launch of NUC 15 Performance, a barebone mini PC. It features Intel Core Ultra 9/7 processors and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070/5060 Laptop GPUs. The NUC 15 supports up to five displays, Killer Wi-Fi 7, and is designed for business, creative professionals, and AI developers.

articles.title: No kitchen? No problem: Portable blenders revolutionize tiny-space cooking
articles.author: Tags
articles.summary: Health Ranger Store is introducing the Blendi X Ice Crushing Portable Blender, a 24-oz portable blender with ice-crushing capabilities and USB rechargeability and the Blendi Hydroluxe Tumbler Water Bottle 20oz, a 24-hour cold retention water bottle, perfect for Blendi portable blender recipes. The Blendi X Ice Crushing Portable Blender features a travel-friendly bottle conversion, blade cover accessories, and a pulse mode.

articles.title: ComfyOnline: Streamlined AI Workflow Deployment
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: ComfyOnline introduces a cloud-based platform designed to streamline AI application development and deployment by providing an online environment for running ComfyUI workflows. The platform eliminates the need for expensive hardware and complex setups, operating on a pay-as-you-go model.

articles.title: 37 TikTok Products With Over 10,000 Rave Ratings
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article features a collection of newly introduced or updated products spanning beauty, home, and personal care categories. It highlights features like easy root touch-up with a powder, mess-free pancake batter dispensing, effective exfoliation, innovative cleaning solutions, updated beauty products, and convenient electronic lighters, showcasing various company and product introductions to the consumers.  These items are presented with a focus on their unique attributes and positive reviewer feedback.

articles.title: Einstein Bros. Bagels Continues Growth In Houston
articles.author: Sheryl Birch
articles.summary: Einstein Bros. Bagels has opened a new bakery in Katy, TX, offering its signature bagels, egg sandwiches, and catering services. To celebrate, customers can enjoy a buy-one-get-one-free egg sandwich for the first two weeks with code BOGO when ordering in bakery, online, or in the app. They also offer the 'Good for Groups' options like the Brunch Box and the Baker's Dozen Bagels Box.

articles.title: Plans for AI-powered drive-thru
articles.summary: Bocca Felice, the UK's first AI-powered drive-thru coffee chain, is awaiting approval for its new location. The company uses AI voice technology for order taking and upselling, with high-capacity coffee machines ensuring quick service. Bocca Felice plans to open 22 sites this year and 80 in 2026, featuring car wash units and EV charging points in some locations.

articles.title: Best cellphone stands for hands-free viewing anywhere
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article highlights the features of different cellphone stands, including the Nulaxy A4 which is foldable and travel-friendly, the Lamicall Cell Phone Stand known for its wide device compatibility and sturdy build, and the AONKEY Car Dash Cell Phone Holder with a sticky base pad for vehicle use. These stands offer various functionalities and are available in different designs.

articles.title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 review: Surprisingly slick for the Price
articles.author: Pranav Dixit
articles.summary: Lava launched the Blaze AMOLED 2, a budget-friendly smartphone featuring a 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7060. It includes a 50MP Sony IMX752 sensor for the main camera and offers clean Android 15 software with no bloatware.

articles.title: Tiny Bookshop is your next cozy game obsession
articles.author: Austin Manchester
articles.summary: Neoludic Games has launched "Tiny Bookshop," a management simulation game. In this game, players manage a mobile bookshop in a European-inspired seaside town and experience various scenarios as a bookseller.

articles.title: 32 Home Products You'll Regret Not Buying Sooner (Sorry In Advance)
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Capri Blue introduced a Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Miss Mouth launched Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray to address stubborn stains caused by messy eaters. Snug Plugs released a product to fix loose outlets without needing an electrician.

articles.title: Aldi's New Line of Zero Sugar Mocktail-Inspired Sparkling Waters Have Shoppers Stocking Their Carts Fast
articles.summary: Aldi is launching Zero Sugar Mocktail Sparkling Water in Pina Colada, Strawberry Margarita, and Mojito flavors. The 8-pack of 12-ounce cans will sell for $3.55 and will be available for a limited time between August 13 and 19.

articles.title: 36 Beloved End-Of-Summer Finds
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Dove is launching Coconut Milk & Sugar Lychee Body Wash. The new body wash is known for heavenly scent and has gentle, creamy formula.

articles.title: Bbva Mexico Launches Virtual Assistant 'Blue'
articles.author: Notisistema
articles.summary: BBVA Mexico has introduced Blue, a new AI-powered virtual assistant service. This service aims to provide customer support in under 30 seconds, streamlining the customer service experience.

articles.title: Tesco's 'gorgeous' £18 shoppers love comes in 'beautiful' colour
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Tesco F&F Clothing is offering a new shirt that is gaining popularity among fans.

articles.title: Food Bites: diners snap up tickets to Emerson's lunch on the lake
articles.author: Lisa Rockman
articles.summary: Newy Fried Chicken has launched a "take-out kitchen" to reduce wait times for customers. Whispering Brook is hosting an exclusive 25th Anniversary Celebration with tastings and a dining experience.

articles.title: I recommend this OnePlus phone over most midrange Androids - and it's $50 off
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: OnePlus Nord N30 is a smartphone targeting budget-conscious consumers. It is currently available at a reduced price for a limited time.

articles.title: Poco M7 Plus with 7000mAh battery, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 silicon launched in India
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Poco unveiled a new mid-range phone on Wednesday, August 13th. This announcement signals the introduction of a new product to the market by Poco.

articles.title: There are 6 million ways to customize this V8-powered Dodge SUV
articles.author: New Atlas
articles.summary: Dodge is releasing the 2026 Dodge Durango SRT Hellcat, a new model year of its SUV.

articles.title: Sali Hughes on beauty: My easy in-flight skincare routine
articles.author: The Guardian
articles.summary: A new simple kit is available that hydrates and protects your face.

articles.title: du launches region's first live 5G-Advanced network in UAE with Huawei
articles.author: Gulf Business
articles.summary: The deployment of 5G-Advanced delivers notable benefits for consumers and enterprises.

articles.title: Coldware, Nexchain & Solana; Top Crypto's For Massive Gains and Real Utility In 2025
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Coldware (COLD) is introducing the Larna 2400 smartphone, a flagship device featuring built-in staking, secure cold storage, encrypted messaging, and dApp access. The phone uses Coldware OS as its native Web3 operating system.

articles.title: Box's AI agents set to help US government agencies
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: A vendor is offering AI models from OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic on GSA's OneGov platform. This provides a consolidated access point for government agencies to leverage various AI capabilities, effectively launching a new service offering.

articles.title: OKB Price Skyrockets Over 163% Amid Historic OKX Announcement
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: OKB has surged due to growing activity in the OKX ecosystem, driven by a new product.

articles.title: Griffith Food's tenderizer marinade taps into natural trend
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: OptiTender Marinade provides a natural alternative to traditional enzyme-based tenderizers. The product aims to offer a new and improved option for marinades.
